name: System Override
description:
Background

thread number 41, i'm your parent program.

our goal is to breach into this system.

your task is to delete the firewall rules that keep me from getting in

we have only 60 seconds to breach through 3 levels of firewall security

i can only send you signals of which ones you should disable or they'll find me and everything will be compromised

but beware: you must disable the rules in the RIGHT ORDER.
otherwise the protection system will get to us sooner than expected, since for each rule disabled in the wrong order we lose 2 seconds from the little time we have

Controls

It’s an FPS, so it’s the usual move with ASWD and point and shoot with the mouse.

Comment

Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 41!

I’m proud of what I’ve managed to accomplish since I’m very tired and until halfway through the last day I was still programming main mechanics and deciding the gameplay ^^"

I hope you all enjoy. Please, leave feedbacks!
